price: ߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ( ߛߋߓߊ߯ߦߊ ) ߦߌ߬ߘߊ߬ߞߏ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߎߟߎ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߓߊ ߞߊ߲߬ ߦߏ߫ ߞߐ߲߬ߞߍ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
